content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Station at (24.0, -15.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (24.0, -15.0)
- Wooden chest at (23.5, -16.5) containing 59 coal

### Iron Ore Mining Station at (-14.0, 23.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-14.0, 23.0)
- Wooden chest at (-14.5, 21.5) containing 397 iron ore

### Iron Smelting Station at (-10.0, 20.0)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (-11.0, 20.0) and (-9.0, 20.0), each containing 23 coal as fuel

### Copper Processing Complex at (20.0-24.5, 17.5-22.5)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (20.0, 20.0)
- Wooden chest at (20.5, 21.5) containing 203 copper ore
- Stone furnace at (24.0, 20.0) with 50 coal as fuel
- Wooden chest at (24.5, 17.5) containing 51 copper plates
- Burner inserter at (24.5, 18.5) with 17 coal as fuel, moving items between furnace and output chest
- Burner inserter at (22.5, 20.5) with 19 coal as fuel, moving items to furnace
- Burner inserter at (20.5, 22.5) with 19 coal as fuel, moving items from input chest

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with belt connections
- Cannot connect belts directly from wooden chests
- Use inserters to move items from chests onto belts

### Fuel management errors
- Ensure you have coal in your inventory before attempting to fuel burner entities
- Keep track of coal supplies and maintain adequate amounts for refueling operations
- Multiple burner mining drills are currently out of fuel and non-operational

### Entity placement considerations
- When creating automated systems, ensure proper connections between entities using appropriate inserters and belts
- Verify that entities are properly aligned and can interact with each other as intended
